TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Annotation extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea

summary.span: 定义所有批注共有的属性和方法。

span.span: Defines properties and methods common to all annotations.

summary.span: 这是一个抽象类。

span.span: This is an abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注通常用于注释或修饰图表元素，如数据点。Annotations are commonly used to comment or elaborate on chart elements such as data points. 此外可以使用批注来绘制自定义形状。Annotations can also be used to draw custom shapes. 默认情况下，批注位于 (0，0) 表示的左上角和 (100100) 表示图表图像的右下角中使用相对坐标。By default, annotations are positioned using relative coordinates, with (0,0) representing the top-left corner, and (100,100) representing the bottom-right corner of the chart image. 还有可能从该相对坐标系统切换到使用的轴值的系统。It is also possible to switch from this relative coordinate system to a system that uses axis values. 与轴坐标系统、 X 和 Y，表示批注的左上角的位置，使用设置 X 轴和 Y 轴值，而不是介于 0-100 的值。With an axis coordinate system, X and Y, which represent the position of the top-left corner of an annotation, are set using X axis and Y axis values, instead of values that range from 0-100. 有两种方法时要使用的轴值指定的位置和大小的批注：There are two ways to use axis values when you specify the position and size of an annotation: - 设置，到这些批注属性或两个并属性值的对象。Set the , or both of these annotation properties to the and property values of a object. - 使用属性将批注固定在某个数据点。Use the property to anchor the annotation to a data point. 在这种情况下，将自动计算它的定位。In this case, its positioning is automatically calculated. 所有批注都派生自类，该类可用于将常见属性设置为所有对象，例如颜色、 位置、 锚定和等等。All annotations are derived from the class, which can be used to set attributes common to all objects, such as color, position, anchoring and so forth.

protected: Annotation();

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象类，不能直接创建。 is an abstract class and cannot be created directly. 若要创建新的批注对象，请使用类的构造函数如或。To create a new annotation object, use constructors of classes such as or .

summary.span: 获取或设置批注所定位到的数据点。

span.span: Gets or sets the data point to which an annotation is anchored.

value.span: 批注所定位到的 对象。

span.span: A object to which an annotation is anchored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注所定位到指定的数据点的 X 和 Y 值，并会自动为数据点使用相同的轴坐标。The annotation is anchored to the X and Y values of the specified data point, and automatically uses the same axes coordinates as the data point. 若要自动放置批注相对于定位点，请确保其并属性设置为。To automatically position the annotation relative to the anchor point, make sure its and properties are set to . 属性可以用于相对于定位点更改批注的自动位置对齐方式。The property can be used to change the annotation's automatic position alignment to the anchor point. 和属性可用于添加额外的间距。The and properties can be used to add extra spacing. 如果使用此属性，请确保并属性设置为，因为它们的优先顺序。When you use this property, make sure the and properties are set to , as they have precedence. 将此值设置为`null`若要禁用某个数据点锚定的批注。Set this value to `null` to disable annotation anchoring to a data point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注所定位到的 X 坐标和指定在相对图表或轴坐标，具体取决于属性值。The annotation is anchored to the X coordinate and is specified in relative chart or axes coordinates, depending on the property value. 若要自动放置批注相对于定位点，请确保其属性设置为。To automatically position an annotation relative to an anchor point, make sure its property is set to . 属性可以用于相对于定位点更改批注的自动位置对齐方式。The property can be used to change the automatic position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point. 和属性可用于添加额外的间距。The and properties may be used to add extra spacing. 此属性的优先级高于属性。This property has a higher priority than the property. 将此值设置为若要禁用的值锚定的批注。Set this value to to disable annotation anchoring to the value.

span.span: Gets or sets the X axis to which an annotation is attached.

value.span: 批注所附加到的 对象。

span.span: An object to which the annotation is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在批注附加到轴，始终在轴坐标中指定其 X 位置。When an annotation is attached to an axis, its X position is always specified in axes coordinates. 若要同时在轴坐标中定义批注的大小，请确保属性设置为`false`。To also define the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, make sure the property is set to `false`. 将此值设置为`null`禁用到轴的附件。Set this value to `null` to disable attachment to the axis.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the chart area to which an annotation is clipped.

value.span: 一个 ，表示现有图表区域的名称。

span.span: A that represents the name of an existing chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定图表区名称，则将仅指定的图表区域的绘图区域内绘制批注。If the chart area name is specified, an annotation will only be drawn inside the plotting area of the chart area specified. 将剪辑在绘图区外的批注的所有部分。All parts of the annotation outside of the plotting area will be clipped. 若要禁用图表区剪辑，请将属性设置为。To disable chart area clipping, set the property to .

summary.span: 获取或设置批注的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of an annotation.

value.span: 一个 值，表示批注的高度。

span.span: A value that represents the height of an annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注的高度可以是的负值，用例注释方向切换顺序。The height of an annotation can be a negative value, in which case the annotation orientation is switched. 批注高度可以是在相对图表坐标中或在轴坐标中。Annotation height can be in relative chart coordinates or in axes coordinates. 默认情况下将使用图表相对坐标。Chart relative coordinates are used by default. 若要使用轴坐标，定位数据点使用的批注属性或设置批注轴使用或属性并设置属性设置为`false`。To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the property, or set the annotation axes using the or properties and set the property to `false`. 将高度设置为可自动调整大小计算的文本的注释。Set the height to to achieve automatic size calculation for annotations with text. 大小会根据自动计算批注文本和字体大小。The size will automatically be calculated based on the annotation text and font size.

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the size of an annotation is always defined in relative chart coordinates.

value.span: 如果批注的 和 始终以相对图表坐标来表示，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the and of an annotation are always expressed in relative chart coordinates; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在相对图表或轴坐标中，可能会设置高度和宽度的批注。The height and width of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates. 相对图表坐标是默认值。Relative chart coordinates are the default. 以轴坐标中的批注的大小，设置属性设置为`false`。To express the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, set the property to `false`. 然后将批注固定在某个数据点，或设置和属性。Then anchor the annotation to a data point or set the and properties.
